posts.content:
The blockchain platform, Tezos, is in the spotlight on the new Blockchain Topic to help visualize the endless possibility of decentralization. Submit images depicting things like NFTs, cryptocurrency and blockchain technology.

Incorporate Tezos in your submission for a chance to win a prize! Learn more here.

        "vOffset": 100,
        "alignment": "center",
        "onMouseUp": "sun1.opacity = (sun1.opacity / 100) * 90;"
    }
}}
